channel.title: Killing bots can cause a server crash
channel.description:
Bots that are killed can randomly crash the server. The issue seems to be related to ragdolls. I don't know if this occurs for connected players.
First video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zNeMC1xDW5Y). Second video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mHj5HQEMu8o).
The first video only shows gibbing ragdolls, which I first believed to be the cause. The second video shows the output from `g_debug_ragdoll_removal`, and where I don't gib the ragdolls and the crash still occurs.
All 3+ crashes are access violations at the same address. If you want more dumps I could certainly post more.
Find the dump [here](https://content.jame.xyz/sharex/crash_bms.exe_20190708033357_1.dmp).
